title: Scenario: Selecting Favorite Team on Initial Launch
custom_preconds:
Given the user is launching the app for the first time
And the user receives the "Select your favorite team" prompt
And taps on Select Now
custom_steps:
When the "Select a Favorite Team" list is displayed
And the user scrolls down to the Houston Astros
custom_expected: Then the updated Astros' logo will be displayed to the left of the Houston Astros entry

title: Scenario: Scoreboard for 2012 have updated logo
custom_preconds:
Given the user has launched At Bat
And is viewing the Scoreboard view
custom_steps:
When the user navigates back to the 2012 season
And views Houston Astros' games
custom_expected: Then the updated Astros' logo will display next to the Houston Astros on the Scoreboard for all games

title: Scenario: Astros Game in Preview state
custom_preconds:
Given the user has launched At Bat
And is viewing the Scoreboard view
custom_steps: When the user views an Astros' game in a Preview state
custom_expected: Then the updated Astros' logo will be displayed next to the Astros' entry on the Scoreboard

title: Scenario: Astros Game in Live state
custom_preconds:
Given the user has launched At Bat
And is viewing the Scoreboard view
custom_steps: When the user views an Astros' game in a Live state (or In Progress)
custom_expected: Then the updated Astros' logo will be displayed next to the Astros' entry on the Scoreboard

title: Original Gameday - Astros Games in Preview State
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the Original Gameday Mode enabled
And the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
And has tapped on a Houston Astros' game in a Preview state
custom_steps: When the Preview popover is displayed
custom_expected: Then the updated Houston Astros' logo will display alongside Houston at the top

title: Responsive Gameday - Astros Games in Preview State
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the Responsive (2013-Beta) Gameday Mode enabled 
And the user has navigated to the Scoreboard 
And has tapped on a Houston Astros' game in a Preview state
custom_steps: When the Pregame/Matchups screen loads
custom_expected: Then the updated Houston Astros' logo will display alongside Houston at the top of the Pregame tab

title: ***Original Gameday - Astros Games in Live State
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the Original Gameday Mode enabled
And the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
And has tapped on a Houston Astros' game in a Live state
custom_steps: When the PBP view loads

title: Responsive Gameday - Astros Games in Live State
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the Responsive (2013-Beta) Gameday Mode enabled
And the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
And has tapped on a Houston Astros' game in a Live state
custom_steps: When the Gameday Live tab loads
custom_expected:
Then the updated Houston Astros' uniforms will be displayed on the batter
And the stadium image will be updated and will not show the old Astros' logo

(Updated stadium image/uniforms will be provided in 2013)

title: Responsive Gameday - Scoring Plays (Live or Final)
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the Responsive (2013-Beta) Gameday Mode enabled
And the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
And has tapped on a Houston Astros' game in a Live or Final state
And the Gameday Live/Wrap tab loads
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the Plays tab
And selects Scoring plays
custom_expected: Then the updated Astros' logo will display to the left of every Astros' scoring play

title: Responsive Gameday - All Plays (Live or Final)
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the Responsive (2013-Beta) Gameday Mode enabled
And the user has navigated to the Scoreboard
And has tapped on a Houston Astros' game in a Live or Final state
And the Gameday Live/Wrap tab loads
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the Plays tab
And selects All Plays
custom_expected: Then the updated Astros' logo will display next to the corresponding Inning Header (ex. Top of 1st) in which Houston bats

title: Original Gameday - Astros Games in Final State
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the Original Gameday Mode enabled 
And the user has navigated to the Scoreboard 
And has tapped on a Houston Astros' game in a Final state
custom_steps: When the Gameday Wrap view loads
custom_expected: Then the updated Houston Astros' logo will display alongside Houston's results at the top of the Game Wrap

title: Responsive Gameday - Astros Game in Final State
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the Responsive (2013-Beta) Gameday Mode enabled 
And the user has navigated to the Scoreboard 
And has tapped on a Houston Astros' game in a Final state
custom_steps: When Gameday Wrap screen loads
custom_expected: Then the updated Houston Astros' logo will display alongside Houston's results at the top of the Game Wrap

title: News Filter - Astros Logo
custom_preconds: Given the user has selected the News option from the Main Menu
custom_steps:
When the user opens the News Filter
And scrolls down to the Houston Astros
custom_expected: Then the updated Astros' logo will display next to the Houston Astros' team listing

title: News Filter - Tapping Astros' Cell
custom_preconds: Given the user has selected the News option from the Main Menu
custom_steps:
When the user taps the News Filter
And selects the Houston Astros
custom_expected:
Then the Astros' news index will be displayed
And the logo now displayed in the News Filter will be the updated Astros' logo

title: Team List - Houston Astros' logo
custom_preconds: Given the user has selected the Teams option in the Main Menu
custom_steps: When the user scrolls down to the Houston Astros
custom_expected: Then the updated logo for the Astros will display to the right of the team name

title: Team Page Header - Astros' Logo
custom_preconds: Given the user has selected the Teams option from the Main Menu
custom_steps: When the user selects the Houston Astros from the Team list
custom_expected: Then the updated Astros logo will be visible as the Back button in the Action Bar

title: News - Back button logo
custom_preconds:
Given the user has selected the Teams option in the Main Menu
And has selected the Houston Astros
custom_steps: When the user taps on the News section on the team page
custom_expected: Then the updated Astros' logo will display as the Back button in the Action Bar

title: Video - Back button logo
custom_preconds:
Given the user has selected the Teams option in the Main Menu
 And has selected the Houston Astros
custom_steps: When the user taps on the Video section on the team page
custom_expected: Then the updated Astros' logo will display as the Back button in the Action Bar

title: Video - Back button logo on player videos
custom_preconds:
Given the user has selected the Teams option in the Main Menu 
And has selected the Houston Astros
And selects the Video option on the team page
custom_steps:
When the user taps "Browse by Player"
And selects an Astros player
custom_expected: Then the updated Astros' logo will display as the Back button in the Action Bar next to the player's name

title: Schedule and Results (2012) - Back button logo
custom_preconds:
Given the user has tapped on the Teams option in the Main Menu
And has selected the Houston Astros from the Team list
custom_steps: When the user taps on Schedule and Results
custom_expected: Then the updated Astros' logo will display as the Back button (next to the text "Schedule")

title: Schedule and Results (2012) - List view should show the Houston logo
custom_preconds:
Given the user has selected the Teams option from the Main Menu
And the user has selected the Houston Astros
custom_steps:
When the user taps the News option
And taps the List tab
custom_expected: Then the updated Astros logo will be displayed for each game matchup

title: Schedule and Results (2012) - Month view should show the new Houston logo when tapping on a day that a game was played
custom_preconds:
Given the user has selected the Teams option from the Main Menu
And the user has selected the Houston Astros
custom_steps:
When the user taps on Schedule and Results
And the user taps on a game from the 2012 season
custom_expected: Then the Matchup Popover will display the Astros' updated logo

title: Tickets & Promotions - Back button logo
custom_preconds:
Given the user has selected the Teams option from the Main Menu
And the user selects the Houston Astros
custom_steps: When the user taps the Tickets & Promotions option on the team page
custom_expected: Then the updated Astros' logo will display as the Back button in the Action Bar (next to "Tickets")

title: Roster - Back button logo
custom_preconds:
Given the user has selected the Teams option in the Main Menu
And the user has selected the Houston Astros from the Team list
custom_steps: When the user taps on Roster
custom_expected: Then the updated Astros' logo will display as the Back button in the Action Bar

title: Video Filter - Astros' logo
custom_preconds: Given the user has selected the Video option from the Main Menu
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the Video filter
And scrolls down to the Houston Astros
custom_expected: Then the updated Astros' logo will be displayed to the left of the Houston Astros' cell

title: Video Filter - Tapping Astros' Cell
custom_preconds: Given the user has selected the Video option from the Main Menu
custom_steps:
When the user taps the Video filter
And selects the Houston Astros
custom_expected:
Then the Houston Astros' video index will be displayed
And the Video filter will still display the updated Astros' logo to the left of the Houston Astros listing

title: Team Widget - Astros' Launcher Icon (Handset)
custom_preconds:
Given the user has placed the Houston Astros Team widget on the device's homescreen
 And the user is using an Android Handset
custom_steps: When the user views their device's home screen
custom_expected: Then the updated Astros' logo will be visible on the launcher icon

title: Team Widget - Launching Astros News Index (Handset)
custom_preconds:
Given the user has placed the Houston Astros Team widget on the device's homescreen 
And the user is using an Android Handset
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to their homescreen
And taps on the Houston Astros' team widget
custom_expected: Then At Bat will launch/open to the Houston Astros' news index

title: Team Widget - Team Widget Selection List (Handset)
custom_preconds: Given the user attempts to place the Houston Astro's team widget on their homescreen
custom_steps:
When the user is prompted with the Team Widget Selection List
And scrolls down to the Houston Astros
custom_expected: Then the updated Astros' logo will be displayed to the left of the Houston Astros listing

title: Scenario: Astros Logo on Feed Buttons
custom_preconds:
Given there is a live Houston Astros' game with a Houston feed available
And the user has navigated to the MLB.tv menu
custom_steps: When the feed is launched for the Astros' game
custom_expected: Then the updated Astros' logo will appear on the feed button associated with the Houston Astros' feed

custom_steps:

custom_expected: Then the updated Astros' logo will be displayed to the left of the Houston Astros entry

title: Tablet Gameday - Scoreboard List
custom_preconds:
Given the user is on the Gameday view
And there is a Houston Astros' game on the current date
custom_steps: When the user views the Astros' game in the Scoreboard list on the left hand side of the screen
custom_expected: Then the updated Astros' logo will be visible to the left of the Astros team name

title: Tablet Gameday - Astros Game in Preview State
custom_preconds:
Given the user has navigated to Gameday
And there is an Astros' game scheduled
custom_steps: When the user selects the Astros' game in the Scoreboard list on the left side of the screen
custom_expected: Then the updated Astros' logo will be displayed on the Game Preview screen

title: Tablet Gameday - Astros Game in Live State (PBP view)
custom_preconds:
Given the user has navigated to Gameday
And there is a Houston Astros' game in a Live state
custom_steps: When the user taps on the Houston Astros' game
custom_expected: Then the updated Astros' logo will appear at the top of the PBP view next to the Astros' score

title: Tablet Gameday - Astros Game in Live State (Lite User)
custom_preconds:
Given the user is using the Lite version of the app
And the user has navigated to the Scoreboard 
And has tapped on a Houston Astros' game in a Live state
custom_steps: When the Game Summary view loads
custom_expected: Then the updated Astros' logo will appear within the gamecenter image displayed above the matchup grid
